description: Updates a conditional forwarder that has been set up for your Amazon Web Services directory.

parameters.name: DirectoryId
parameters.description: The directory ID of the Amazon Web Services directory for which to update the conditional forwarder.

parameters.name: RemoteDomainName
parameters.description: The fully qualified domain name (FQDN) of the remote domain with which you will set up a trust relationship.

parameters.name: DnsIpAddrs
parameters.description: The updated IP addresses of the remote DNS server associated with the conditional forwarder. (string) ---
